CustomField.description: This checkbox is "hidden" from page layouts and will be set in two ways. The field will be CHECKED by a scheduled APEX job that looks for 120 days from the Truck.Mobile Expiration Date field and after the notification email is successfully sent. The field will be UNCHECKED by a Workflow Field Update when the Truck.Mobile Expiration Date is updated by the user.
CustomField.label: *Delete*Expiration Email Sent
